title: I.P.C.P.R 2010
itunes:title: I.P.C.P.R 2010
description: With host Dave Garofalo on location in New Orleans at the 2010 I.P.C.P.R (International Premium Cigar & Pipe Retailers Association) tradeshow, Tommy Grella takes the Captain's Chair this week along side special guest host Arthur Richter.  The boys light up and take us behind the scenes of the 2010 I.P.C.P.R. sharing all the latest news and developments including exclusive smoke reviews of the newly released Carillo EP, Alec Bradley, Tempus Medero and Cuvee Grand.  Sit back, light up and enjoy the show!
